TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PersistenceProviderElement extends System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The WF3 types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new WF4 types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Represents a persistence service configuration element that specifies the type of the persistence provider implementation to use, as well as the time-out to use for persistence operations. Additional attributes that appear in this element are passed into the constructor for the specified persistence provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Persistence provider configuration elements are typically defined in the application configuration file, under the `system.serviceModel` node, in the `serviceBehaviors` subsection of the `behaviors` section.
